The RecordId Specific Could Not Be Found

fields.name: unableToVerifyFooter

fields.name: lbl_unableToVerifyHeadline_Certificate
fields.fieldText:
We Could Not Verify Your JWT Certificate


The JWT Certificate Name Mapped to this B2C Client ID Was Not Found

We were unable to verify that the JWT Certificate name associated to this B2C Client ID definition exists within this Salesforce org. The JWT Certificate name represents the unique name of the certificate that will be used to mint JWT tokens that broken authentication with B2C Commerce.

fields.name: unableToVerifyFooter_0
fields.fieldText:
This B2C Client ID requires a valid JWT Certificate Name so that it can be used in b2c-crm-sync REST API interactions. Assigning this B2C Client ID to an Instance, CustomerList, or Site will generate application exceptions.


If you are unsure of what value to provide, please visit the Certificate and Key Management page and locate the unique name of the certificate that should be used to mint JWT tokens for this B2C Client ID.

fields.name: unableToVerifyFooter_0_0
fields.fieldText:
This B2C Client ID requires a valid JWT Certificate Name so that it can be used in b2c-crm-sync REST API interactions. This B2C Client ID can be assigned to Instances, CustomerLists, and Sites.


If you would like to change the JWT Certificate for this B2C Client ID, please visit the Certificate and Key Management page and locate the unique name of the certificate that should be used instead of the one assigned.
